location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the inside back cover with 4; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located at the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains a note stating that the contents have been transferred to 'Econ III E(B)14643/49'. A list of correspondence references previously contained in the file by year appears on the front cover.
